statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE trial_id = 101 AND status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND sponsor = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM trial_patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM trial_sites WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE trial_id = 5 AND treatment_name = 'Placebo';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE trial_id = 2 AND duration < 7;
